name: Courtyard by Marriott San Luis Obispo

reviews.text: This is a new, sparkling clean hotel! But not only is it new, making it the best of the many San Luis Obispo hotels I've stayed in, the level of service is also way above average. The staff are friendly and helpful. The rooms are very nice including an LCD TV with inputs for watching a DVD from your laptop. It's very well maintained and super clean.
reviews.title: Great new hotel!

reviews.text: The only downside is the location. There's nothing within walking distance, so be prepared to drive to shoppping, restaurants, etc.
reviews.title: Best choice around Central Coast

reviews.text: Overall, the best place in SLO!
reviews.title: great new hotel best staff ever

likes.liked: — modern and fresh free coffee nice touch

aka: Courtyard By Marriott San Luis Obispo Hotel San Luis Obispo
description: The Courtyard by Marriott is San Luis Obispo's newest hotel and is conveniently located near Cal Poly and is 7 mi to Pismo and Avila Beach. The Courtyard San Luis Obispo is 4 mi to San Luis Obispo County Airport with easy access to all area attractions and landmarks. Our San Luis Obispo hotel has a distinctive architectural style where you can enjoy the warmth of the California sun. The Courtyard San Luis Obispo has a customer-focused guest room design combining both comfort and functionality. Our San Luis Obispo hotel offers spacious rooms, complimentary wireless internet, as well as a fitness center and an outdoor heated pool with jacuzzi.
